name: places/ChIJX0Z1TCpawokR-3QA6a2uMM4
formattedAddress: 204 Clinton St # 1, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 204 Clinton St # 1, New York, NY 10002-7576, USA

originalText.text: I love this pharmacy. I started at their Avenue B location, which was right up the block from where I lived. That location is amazing as well. I was moving and told them that I was very upset because I was moving and the Avenue B location was too far for me to go to for my medication. They asked me where I was moving to and when I told them they told me about the Clinton Street location which is right up the block from where I live now. I couldn't be happier. I've been with them for many many years and every time I go in for my refills they greet me personally and with smiles. I highly recommend either location. They are very helpful ðŸ‘Œ

originalText.text: They're kind and very helpful. The pharmacist calls to check on you and on your birthday they call to wish a happy birthday.  Medilaine is one of the best phmarcies in this area.

text.text: They're kind and very helpful. The pharmacist calls to check on you and on your birthday they call to wish a happy birthday.  Medilaine is one of the best phmarcies in this area.

originalText.text: Please do not go to this pharmacy,  my mom is 76yrs old gets some kinda card from world trade fund to buy meds and stuff. Every time she goes without me, they clean out here card of balance. For instance, she brought 60$ worth, had 140$ ,they told here she was good, that she had no more cash on card. Didnt give her a receipt either.  I added it up, they got over on her, its not the first time. PLEASE DO NOT GO TO THIS PHARMACY, THEY ARE ROBBING THE ELDERLY, WHO CANNOT FIGHT BACK!!!!

originalText.text: I'll rate them a big fat zero. They refused to notarize a document that was signed in advance due to the fact that my spouse had a medical situation and could not be present, even though I had documentation proving it. They wouldn't even look at the proof. But I'll bet if it was one of their fellow asian illegals they'd do it without a problem.

originalText.text: They've got a notary here, also copying needs. For the few times I've needed help finding something or had stock related questions they have been very helpful and friendly.
